testcase.name: HomeController returns a 200 response
HomeController#index responds successfully
NotesController#index searches notes by the provided keyword
ProjectsController#index as an authenticated user responds successfully
ProjectsController#index as a guest returns a 302 response
ProjectsController#index as a guest redirects to the sign-in page
ProjectsController#show as an authorized user responds successfully
ProjectsController#show as an unauthorized user redirects to the dashboard
ProjectsController#create as an authenticated user with valid attributes adds a project
ProjectsController#create as an authenticated user with invalid attributes does not add a project
ProjectsController#create as a guest returns a 302 response
ProjectsController#create as a guest redirects to the sign-in page
ProjectsController#update as an authorized user updates a project
ProjectsController#update as an unauthorized user does not update the project
ProjectsController#update as an unauthorized user redirects to the dashboard
ProjectsController#update as a guest returns a 302 response
ProjectsController#update as a guest redirects to the sign-in page
ProjectsController#destroy as an authorized user deletes a project
ProjectsController#destroy as an unauthorized user does not delete the project
ProjectsController#destroy as an unauthorized user redirects to the dashboard
ProjectsController#destroy as a guest returns a 302 response
ProjectsController#destroy as a guest redirects to the sign-in page
ProjectsController#destroy as a guest does not delete the project
ProjectsController#complete as an authenticated user an unsuccessful completion redirects to the project page
ProjectsController#complete as an authenticated user an unsuccessful completion sets the flash
ProjectsController#complete as an authenticated user an unsuccessful completion doesn't mark the project as completed
TasksController#show responds with JSON formatted output
TasksController#create responds with JSON formatted output
TasksController#create adds a new task to the project
TasksController#create requires authentication
GeocodeUserJob calls geocode on the user
UserMailer welcome_email sends a welcome email to the user's email address
UserMailer welcome_email sends from the support email address
UserMailer welcome_email sends with the correct subject
UserMailer welcome_email greets the user by first name
UserMailer welcome_email reminds the user of the registered email address
Note is valid with a user, project, and message
Note is invalid without a message
Note has one attached attachment
Note delegates name to the user who created it
Note search message for a term when a match is found returns notes that match the search term
Note search message for a term when no match is found returns an empty collection
Project is expected to validate that :name is case-sensitively unique within the scope of :user_id
Project can have many notes
Project late status is late when the due date is past today
Project late status is on time when the due date is today
Project late status is on time when the due date is in the future
Task is valid with a project and name
Task is invalid without a project
Task is invalid without a name
User has a valid factory
User is valid with a first name, last name and email, and password
User is expected to validate that :first_name cannot be empty/falsy
User is expected to validate that :last_name cannot be empty/falsy
User is expected to validate that :email cannot be empty/falsy
User is expected to validate that :email is case-insensitively unique
User returns a user's full name as a string
User sends a welcome email on account creation
User performs geocoding
Home page responds successfully
Projects API loads a project
Projects API creates a project
Projects as an authenticated user with valid attributes adds a project
Projects as an authenticated user with invalid attributes does not add a project
Notes user uploads an attachment
Projects user creates a new project
Projects user completes a project
Sign in user signs in
Sign-ups user successfully signs up
Tasks user toggles a task
